name: @dendra-science/dendra-worker-cli
description: Dendra worker command line interface tool.
author: J. Scott Smith <scott@newleafsolutionsinc.com>

scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run clean && npm run babel
scripts.pkg: npm run pkg-output && npm run pkg-archive
scripts.pkg-archive: npm run pkg-archive-linux-x64 && npm run pkg-archive-linux-x86 && npm run pkg-archive-macos-x64 && npm run pkg-archive-win-x64
scripts.pkg-archive-linux-x64: mkdir -p pkg_archive && cp pkg_output/dendra-worker-cli-linux-x64 pkg_archive/den-worker && zip -Djm pkg_archive/dendra-worker-cli-linux-x64.zip pkg_archive/den-worker
scripts.pkg-archive-linux-x86: mkdir -p pkg_archive && cp pkg_output/dendra-worker-cli-linux-x86 pkg_archive/den-worker && zip -Djm pkg_archive/dendra-worker-cli-linux-x86.zip pkg_archive/den-worker
scripts.pkg-archive-macos-x64: mkdir -p pkg_archive && cp pkg_output/dendra-worker-cli-macos-x64 pkg_archive/den-worker && zip -Djm pkg_archive/dendra-worker-cli-macos-x64.zip pkg_archive/den-worker
scripts.pkg-archive-win-x64: mkdir -p pkg_archive && cp pkg_output/dendra-worker-cli-win-x64.exe pkg_archive/den-worker.exe && zip -Djm pkg_archive/dendra-worker-cli-win-x64.zip pkg_archive/den-worker.exe
scripts.test: npm run lint-test && NODE_ENV=test mocha test --recursive --use_strict
scripts.test:build: npm run build && npm run test
